metadata.synopsis: The Bhaal cultists guarding Minsc's Hideout spot the player and get ready to attack. The player has a brief moment to try and trick the cultists into standing down
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the Bhaal Cultists outside the sluice gate at

0.text: Just as I was getting bored - our Lord sends us a little diversion.

1.text: Bhaal below... it's the false Chosen. One who would die by our hand is unworthy indeed.
